Text.Value: I'm sorry it came to that. But if it was you or them, I'd pick you every time.

EditorData.NodeContext: grateful - knows player had to hurt people to save her friend.

Text.Value: You're here. You're all right - how?

EditorData.NodeContext: her friend, who she thought was dead, is safe and well. Astonished, grateful

Text.Value: In ballads they'd call you 'talented' and 'courageous'.

EditorData.NodeContext: sincere and grateful - playful

Text.Value: With the help of nature's resilience, cunning and fury.
I was in Moonrise and I just happened to run into her.
She's done half the Harpers' job for them already.
He's done half the Harpers' job for them already.
They've done half the Harpers' job for them already.

EditorData.NodeContext: discussing player, impressed - speaking to alfira but talking about player

Text.Value: I'd tell you, but that would spoil the song I'm writing about it.
You forgot 'incredibly good-looking'.

EditorData.NodeContext: lakrissa talking about the player - cheeky and flirty

Text.Value: The druids back in the grove could have learned a thing or two from you.

EditorData.NodeContext: sincere and grateful

Text.Value: I never thought I'd see... well, anyone, again.

EditorData.NodeContext: Delighted and grateful

Text.Value: Lakrissa.

EditorData.NodeContext: lakrissa called the player good looking, alfira is pretending to be shocked and admonishing but is also smiling

Text.Value: Fingers-crossed I'll hear it some day.

EditorData.NodeContext: sincere and grateful

Text.Value: Tactics, planning and, when needed, brute force.
You should have seen her. She was brave but also terrifying - in a good way.
You should have seen him. He was brave but also terrifying - in a good way.
You should have seen them. They were brave but also terrifying - in a good way.

EditorData.NodeContext: discussing player - impressed. Speaking to alfira

Text.Value: How did you do it?

EditorData.NodeContext: still astonished, trying to figure out how player managed to save lakrissa

Text.Value: If it got in my way I killed it.
Well, they're not the ones standing here, are they?

EditorData.NodeContext: sincere and grateful

Text.Value: Killing everyone who got in my way.
We're 'two tiefling queens', remember? I couldn't leave my favourite bard without her partner in crime.

EditorData.NodeContext: alfira thought lakrissa dead - lakrissa is enjoying seeing alfira's face and is being playful and cheeky

Text.Value: Don't play coy - you could have left us behind but you didn't.

EditorData.NodeContext: stern but full of gratitude - wants the player to know they are appreciated

Text.Value: I did have some help from an old friend though.

EditorData.NodeContext: reference to player, grateful and playful

Text.Value: Thank you - a thousand times, thank you. One last favour? Take this off my hands - it suits you better.

EditorData.NodeContext: playful and grateful

Text.Value: Honestly? Sheer dumb luck.
I'm a rogue - breaking and entering is kind of my thing.
If it was anyone else, I'd be sceptical - but you? You've more than earned the title.

EditorData.NodeContext: sincere and grateful

Text.Value: Of course. How could I leave my sidekick without her partner in crime?

EditorData.NodeContext: alfira thought lakrissa dead - lakrissa is enjoying seeing alfira's face and is being playful and cheeky

Text.Value: Don't thank me; I had help from a higher power.
What? It's true.

EditorData.NodeContext: lakrissa talking about the player - cheeky and flirty

Text.Value: By doing what I do best - being a hero.
Then I'm glad you're on our side.

EditorData.NodeContext: sincere and grateful

Synopsis: Lakrissa has been resuced from Moonrise by the player and is reunuined with her closest friend, Alfira.
